Reference

Model-based Estimations

estimate_link() estimate_relation() estimate_expectation() estimate_response() estimate_prediction()

Generate predictions from models

estimate_means()

Estimate Marginal Means (Model-based average at each factor level)

estimate_contrasts()

Estimate Marginal Contrasts

estimate_slopes()

Estimate Marginal Effects

estimate_grouplevel() reshape_grouplevel()

Group-specific parameters of mixed models random effects

Data grids and Visualisation

visualisation_matrix() data_matrix()

Create a reference grid

visualisation_recipe(<estimate_grouplevel>) visualisation_recipe(<estimate_means>) visualisation_recipe(<estimate_predicted>) visualisation_recipe(<estimate_slopes>)

Visualisation Recipe for 'modelbased' Objects

reexports

Objects exported from other packages

Miscellaenous

describe_nonlinear() estimate_smooth()

Describe the smooth term (for GAMs) or non-linear predictors

Easy 'emmeans' and 'emtrends'

find_inversions()

Find points of inversion

zero_crossings()

Find zero crossings of a vector

smoothing()

Smoothing a vector or a time series
